result.name: pensions-strategy-computer-system
result.notes: Pensions Strategy Computer System data contains information required for the processing of claims for Retirement Pension, Incapacity Benefit, Widows Benefit and Severe Disablement Allowance. The data is produced on a quarterly basis and contains individual level information, as well as financial and geographical information.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Pensions Strategy Computer System

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/browse/working/state-pension    Not due to be released. Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
